storyInfo: Talulah allows some of the Infected in her group to leave, sparking an argument with Patriot. And the Infected who left betray Talulah, hoping to divert the attention of the Ursus Army.

attributes.content: Hui-chieh:
We have been heading south.
The guerrillas are hoping to get to as many mines as possible before the extermination plan gets underway to save as many Infected as we can.
The garrison is falling back, and we are pushing further and further ahead.
To outsiders, it probably looks like we are hunting down the Ursus squads. That couldn't be further from the truth, and it's a nigh impossible task.
We are hiding from the Ursus Army while also trying to save the Infected from under their nose.
If you ask me why we are doing this, I guess all I can tell you is, 'It's what we are supposed to do.'
That being said, I can't help but feel that by taking in all these Infected, thus giving the other teams some breathing room, we may be playing into Mr. Patriot's hand.
Patriot might have drawn a line. A line that we dare not to cross.
To cross that line is to fight the Ursus garrison head-on—a tall order, it goes without saying. It's either that or keeping ourselves under the radar.
In other words, we'll have to leave the tundra, and that means infiltrating the real Ursus territory—their nomadic cities, where all aspects of life are ruled with their iron fist.
At that point, the guerrillas put their weapons away until it's time for us to take up arms again.
The treatment of the Infected in the cities and ships out in the wild are bound to be even more cruel. I imagine the days that are to come will be very difficult.
It's not easy to take this step.
But this is the Northwestern Tundra... There's nothing but snow here.
We can't feed all these mouths with just snow.
November 3rd
Year X
My brothers and sisters, are you okay?!
attributes.name: Petrova

attributes.content: It's good to see all of you in one piece.
attributes.name: Petrova

attributes.content: ...Man, was that battle not a disaster.
attributes.name: Petrova

attributes.content: Thank you, Yeti Squad. It's a pleasure to lead the fight with all of you.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: The pleasure is ours, Talulah. We all think it's very reassuring to fight alongside you. We make a good match. Now I can see why FrostNova trusted you to lead our squad.
attributes.name: Petrova

attributes.content: What's more, the way you use your Arts is getting more ingenious by the day. Blasting flames through the cold air, and detonating that? I don't think I could've come up with that one.
attributes.name: Petrova

attributes.content: Well... those weren't exactly flames. It's hard to explain, so I'll spare you the details.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: I'm sure FrostNova can rest easy knowing she doesn't have to look out for us all the time anymore.
attributes.name: Petrova

attributes.content: So, do you think we'll come across any more of those Ursus scum here?
attributes.name: Petrova

attributes.content: Well, this is one of the cities Ursus was planning on dismantling three years ago.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: The troops here managed to take over the city, probably thanks to corruption or some equally dirty work... As for the original residents... probably either enslaved or driven out.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: They didn't stand a chance against us, at the very least.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: They aren't as weak as you're making them out to be.
attributes.name: Petrova

attributes.content: Just relatively speaking. Compared to the regular Ursus Army, at least. It's not like Patriot has let you fight any battles that difficult.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: No, he hasn't. It's true. He didn't think we could handle it. But I think we are more than up to the task now, with how well we're getting on.
attributes.name: Petrova

attributes.content: I'm not so sure about that. The real Ursus Army is on a whole other level. This detachment lacks discipline and training... I'm guessing they might not even be technically organized.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: And we just barely had a leg up over these guys because of our tactical planning.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: ...So you're saying we've got nothing to celebrate?
attributes.name: Petrova

attributes.content: No, far from it. We have all the resources we need to survive now.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: We really needed these supplies. Without them, we won't make it through the winter.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Besides, the nomadic city may be old and run-down, maybe even too small, but...
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: It's big enough for us.
attributes.name: Petrova

attributes.content: None of us have ever been on a nomadic city before.
attributes.name: Petrova

attributes.content: Talulah!
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: What's the matter?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: You're... one of the Infected from the Earcurl village... if my memory serves me correctly.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: We've got a pretty big team ourselves! At the very least, we're no smaller than you guerrillas.
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: Well, you're almost there. I'm not exactly part of the guerrilla force.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: We still definitely had more men in this fight than you.
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: ...So? What do you want from me?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Let's go our own ways here, Talulah.
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: You serious?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: We've fought plenty of battles with you people, and we've taken the shirt off our backs for you way more than I can count.
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: You can take half of the resources in the city. Hell, take more than that.
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: Just let us keep the city.
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: With the city... we could go anywhere. We could be anywhere in the tundra. The Patrol Unit and the Ursus troops will never find us.
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: So you are saying you don't want to fight anymore?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: We'll die.
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: We're... We're all a little...
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: The enemy... They're getting stronger and stronger.
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: These people aren't even on the same level as any of the contingents that Patriot's guerrilla squads have faced.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: But we can't do it!
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: Talulah, you aren't going to deny us even this, are you?
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: Okay, what are you people talking about now?
attributes.name: Petrova

attributes.content: The Yeti...!
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: ...You coldhearted monsters wouldn't understand! Death means nothing to you, not like the rest of us...!
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: You—
attributes.name: Petrova

attributes.content: (Waves Petrova down)
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Talulah...
attributes.name: Petrova

attributes.content: We'll get the supplies out right away. The city is yours to keep.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: That's good to hear...
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: But I won't stand for any insult to our fighters. Apologize to the Yetis right now.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Ahem... Sorry.
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: That will do, right?
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: Petrova, gather your men. We need to itemize the supplies.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: (Also, turn on the Ursus comms terminal we captured.)
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: (You don't mean...)
attributes.name: Petrova

attributes.content: (They know Patriot's guerrilla squad isn't around.)
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Where are you going?
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Mr. Patriot? We were just about to rendezvous with you.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: You handed the city to those folks?
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Looks like you got my message already.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: —What these people are doing is nothing short of betrayal. Your permission has given them the justification they wanted. You destroyed the order here.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: The moment they asked to be let go, I wasn't going to be able to keep them.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Those who lack conviction and willpower shouldn't wage war. Not now, not ever.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: If we go by your logic, no one was born with the right to set foot on the battlefield in the first place.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Discipline is everything.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Kill them, and take the city back. You owe your team and your people this.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: So that they know the Infected will kill a bunch of helpless people with their backs against the wall and grease the wheels with their blood, all for a run-down city?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: They have contravened our discipline.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: None ever fought for discipline to begin with.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: It has been four years since we first met. In all this time, not once have I given you an order. I either tolerated your presence there on the battlefield or refused to work with you.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I really can't know if you have matured or gone soft in that time.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: All because I don't agree with you?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Summon the rest of the Infected and tell them they've betrayed the manifesto. Have them executed immediately.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: You must make an example of their transgression.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I can't do that.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: I can see you are hesitating. You are hesitating because they, too, are Infected.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Is it because you think this is dishonorable?
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: You loathe killing, and you don't care for power. That's not a bad thing. But then you need someone to do the dirty work for you.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I'll let you know I'm not afraid of doing this, and I don't dare to claim I have the moral high ground over anyone either.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: In that case, the guerrillas and I will get it done.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: If you refuse to take up arms against them, the guerrillas will clean up the mess.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: What is that expression? You can't possibly think I am the honest and noble man everyone makes me out to be?
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Someone like that would've been dead long before the fighting even began.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: What's honorable besides reigning victorious and safeguarding the fruits of victory? Triumphing over the enemies you loathe in battle is by its very nature an honor, but that doesn't mean I take pride in my sacrifices.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: If a decision leads to victory and fewer dead comrades, then that's the right decision to make.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: This city is already on its last legs. It's likely been in service for much longer than it was intended. It's not going to last another three years.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Both you and I know that they are doomed to be stranded in the tundra. They'll still have to find a way out in the end. But, with the city, they bought themselves a tiny bit of hope, even if it's just for those three years.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: I'm not going to crush that hope of theirs.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: You're fine seeing your team get torn into two?
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: No. I already told you... they were never on the same team as us to begin with.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: I'm not going to give you the 'the weak cannot go to battle' excuse you've been giving me. All I'm saying is not everyone thinks the same way we do.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: We'll have many people join our ranks. But not all of them are working towards the same goal as we are.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: We're just borrowing their strength. We aren't exploiting it. If we forced them to do our bidding, we would only be making them work against their own goals.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: And that's how you get them to actually start doubting each other and feel alienated.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: All for the sake of unit purity, is it?
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: If that's what you want to call it. I'm not sure I'd describe it like that, though.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: If nothing else, I can tell you are a righteous person.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: There's a unit stationed nearby guarding the trade route, and they're much better trained. You know things are bound to go wrong.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I don't want to admit it, but you're right. They just might do that, so we'll prepare for that.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: The Yetis... intercepted the message already.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: You're right. The nomadic city sent a message out. They tipped off the Ursus troops in the area our location.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: ...They want to draw the Ursus Army's attention to us.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: No one wanted this battle to happen.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Their foolishness will slowly lead them to destruction.
attributes.name: Patriot
